snippet.title: Segapede - The Lost Game from Sega Technical Institute
snippet.description:
Presenting, the original presentation demo pitch ROM for Sega Technical Institute’s (STI) Segapede (also known as Astropede) for the Sega Mega Drive! Special thanks to Craig Stitt for allowing us to present this ROM to you!

Lead Designer: Craig Stitt
Enemy Designer: Alex Niño
Programmer: Ken Rose
Music & Sound: Howard Drossin

For more information on this prototype, check out the article here:
https://tinyurl.com/yee7vs7f

Social Media:
Discord - https://discord.gg/RG723tU
Facebook - https://facebook.com/HiddenPalaceOrg
Twitter - https://twitter.com/HiddenPalaceOrg
Tumblr - http://hiddenpalaceorg.tumblr.com/
